Html:
I have test-driven your component and it really rocks! I will start using it right away, actually.

But I was wondering about the API - my impression is that this is not just a wrapper over the Google API? If so, what is the reason (I'm sure you have thought about it, perhaps there is a technical issue that I don't understan)?  I would like to use fancy stuff like overlays, which I can profit from in my web-application.

Again, fantastic work man!
// Jonas
the reason is to provide free map control to .net and without using any broswer ;}, right now i'm on shape/overlay system in wpf version, you can test it too ;}
OK, I get it. Sounds very promissing!

thx, definitely!

here is picture of real time vehicle tracking application with my control, used in my company: http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/7378/trolisru7.png
